'''Ceremonial Bladework''' is [[Kaeya]]'s [[Normal Attack]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* When Kaeya performs the fifth strike of his Normal Attack sequence, he teleports behind the enemy he is fighting to strike them from behind.
** If he is fighting an enemy who dies after the fourth strike but before the fifth strike, then he will teleport behind another nearby enemy instead.
** As long as there are enemies nearby, Kaeya does not need to be hitting enemies or even be in combat to teleport behind an enemy.
** Kaeya cannot teleport behind shielded Mitachurls or large enemies, nor can he teleport through obstacles.

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
*{{Talent Note|constellation|1|Excellent Blood}}
